bug.author: jloveric
bug.summary: Switching to using LightningDataModule see "has no attribute 'save_hyperparameters'"
bug.description: I'm trying to use the LightningDataModule and so I just copied the data members in my existing LightningModule to a LightningDataModule. The LightningModule takes a config as input and then I call self.save_hyperparameters(cfg). Obviously that same function doesn't work in the LightningDataModule (nor does it make sense). Is there another function in LightningDataModule to save data the parameters (or configuration)?
